name: Paper Plane (itch) (Hasbi Adenan)
description:
• Getting trapped in a kids room , you controls the paper plane using your phone by tilting/rotate it.
  • Fly through the rooms and maneuver avoiding the furniture! enjoy the feeling of staying afloat
  • Beware of the monster! the Godzilla-like toy will chase you wherever you go! (or fly)
  • Defeat the monster before he catches you. Tap the screen to shoot him!

This is our master students project (HAW Hamburg)
The App is a working in progress, but feel free to comments whats on your mind!
Comments & Critics are appreciated!
